name: Khan: Absolute Power
description: The epic based classic online game Khan takes on where Genghis Khan reached the end of his expedition. The game takes place at small kingdom of Eurasia where Genghis Khan's brutal force was never able to conquer. You will re-visit the history and prepare the battles against the greatest conquer of history.
minimum_requirements: OS: 98/ME/2000/XP Processor: 32 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VGA 3D 32 MB DirectX: Version 8.1 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7 (8 & 10)* Processor: 32/64 bit Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VGA 3D 128 MB or Higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Windows 8 & 10 requires windows 7 compatibility mode and must run as admin.

reviews.review_text: Speaking on behalf on the Windows 10 users, this is not a skeptical reflection of the game itself.  Don't have the time to make a fully detailed review so i'll just focus on what i would think are some key points to be adressed. I'll be adding to this review as i go.  - The loading times are ridiculously long, not a huge deal for me, i've got patience but you know. Something to look into. Starting a sorcerer and loading the actual game took around 10 minutes.  - If you're using Windows 10, be ready to deal with quite a ton of technical bugs. Compatability issues, when minimized you can not summon the game from the shortcut, you have to relaunch.  - Constant crashes, i can't get farther then thirty steps without my game crashing.   - I love the style, oh it gives me a little bit of nostalgia that i can not toss aside, i still look forward to giving this a full play.   This is all the reviewing i can do until the game is more refined on Windows 10.

They're not interested about making this game any better for the players. They asked for our help for Khan to get here in Steam. Once they got what they wanted, they ignored us already.   It's like they're just focusing on their main game which is 'Blaze Khan' server.   They don't put too much effort on Khan Steam.

I must tell you, speed hack and cut skill still happen after this morning server restarting (yesterday TheOne answered me, they had been fixed). Please take care and have a good solution for this problem, it will make an unfair game like the beginning of Blaze Server (I mean gold dupe when disconnecting).
